thread.title: Labour civil war over John McDonnell's U-turn on balancing the books - live
thread.title_full: Labour civil war over John McDonnell's U-turn on balancing the books - live

author: Michael Wilkinson
title: Labour civil war over John McDonnell's U-turn on balancing the books - live
text: Labour Labour civil war over John McDonnell's U-turn on balancing the books - live Latest updates as Labour MPs react with fury to plan to reject George Osborne's fiscal charter which would force the government to produce a surplus in 'normal times' Shadow chancellor John McDonnell in Brighton Photo: Heathcliff O'Malley/The Telegraph By Michael Wilkinson , Political Correspondent 11:05AM BST 13 Oct 2015
